thread.title: McClellan Davis, LLC Welcomes Attorney in Sacramento Office
thread.title_full: McClellan Davis, LLC Welcomes New Attorney in Sacramento Office

author: Lisa Sinervo
title: McClellan Davis, LLC Welcomes Attorney in Sacramento Office
text:
McClellan Davis LLC announced today that Lucian Khan, Attorney at Law (and Of Counsel), has joined the firm in their Sacramento office. Lucian comes to McClellan Davis after spending the past 20 years of his legal career working for the California State Board of Equalization. During his Board tenure as an attorney, Lucian initially served as a Business Tax Appeals Hearing Officer, and subsequently as an Appeals Supervisor and Settlement Officer and reviewer. At McClellan Davis, he intends to continue his sales and use tax practice focus and will be working with clients on a variety of matters, ranging from compliance, audit management, appeals and settlement, across a broad range of industries.
“Lucian’s arrival and formidable depth of agency knowledge and experiences further expands our firm’s ability to provide insightful and meaningful solutions to our sales and use tax clients.” said Jesse McClellan, Esq., managing partner and co-founder of McClellan Davis, LLC . “Having worked at the Board of Equalization for as long as he has, he knows the internal strategies and practices behind complex appeal cases, he understands policy review processes, and he has the experience and judgment to get superior results for our clients. We are excited to welcome Lucian Khan to our team.”
“During my tenure at the Board of Equalization, I worked with McClellan Davis on various tax appeals. Their analysis of tax issues were always well reasoned, providing the best results for their clients” said Mr. Khan “I wanted to work with McClellan Davis because I knew that my experience and background was a good fit with their organization.”
Lucian holds a Juris Doctor degree and previously worked as a Deputy District Attorney, where he prosecuted more than 50 jury trial cases. While working at the Board of Equalization he authored over 700 tax decisions and reviewed more than 5,000 decisions. He also received a Superior Accomplishment award for recommending changes in the formatting and review process, for issuing tax decisions.
ABOUT MCCLELLAN AND DAVIS, LLC: McClellan Davis, LLC is a Sacramento, California based company that provides sales and use tax consultation and representation to merchants and CPAs nationwide. Since 1980, McClellan Davis and its predecessor entity have represented thousands of clients, from sole proprietors to multinational corporations, including virtually every type of business that is subject to sales or use tax.
